city.cs.engine

Class CollisionEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • city.cs.engine.CollisionEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class CollisionEvent
extends EventObject
    Event object describing the geometry and dynamics of a collision between two SolidFixtures in a World. The reporting body is the one that sent this event to all its listeners; the other body is the one it collided with. Another event giving the opposite view of the collision will be sent to all listeners attached to the other body.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getFriction

        public float getFriction()
        The combined coefficient of friction of the collision. This is defined as the square root of the product of the coefficients of friction of the colliding shapes.
        Returns:
        the friction coefficient

      • getRestitution

        public float getRestitution()
        The combined coefficient of restitution of the collision. This is defined as the larger of the coefficients of restitution of the colliding shapes.
        Returns:
        the restitution coefficient
